fulltext:
KHANG TRUONG
Senior UI/UX Designer
EXPERIENCE
Senior UI/UX Designer
at VNG Corporation
May 2015 - Present
123Phim: Mobile application has more than 3 million active users, the top 
movies booking ticket application in Vietnam.
123Go: Event Ticketing Solution for Sport, Art and Show
Responsible for:
•
Mobile application UI/UX design (User interview, User flow, User 
Journeys, Sitemap, Wireframe ske, Rapid Prototype, Interaction 
Prototype, Low & High-Fidelity visual design)
•
Web design, included of Website layout, landing page, email 
marketing templates
•
Marketing design, include banners (web, Facebook, ads banner for all 
applications)
•
C.I.P Designs (name card, cover letter, t-shirt, standee ...)
•
Graphic design, develop and translate ideas into impactful visual 
designs
•
Collaborate with marketing and sales team for creative execution and 
template development of sales support, event, content marketing and 
research materials
Senior UI and Graphic Designer
at Orient Software Development Corp.
November 2014 - May 2015 (7 months)
• 
Mobile application UI/UX design 
• 
Design web layout, landing page, email marketing
• 
Marketing designs.
• 
C.I.P Designs for Orient's branding and event :,name card, cover letter, 
t-shirt, standee ...
SUMMARY
A minimal UI Designer with over 7 years 
experience of designing engaging and 
user-friendly interfaces for native and web 
applications for both desktop and mobile 
apps.
An designer which is able to be the primary 
contributor to projects as well as product 
owner for every application.
Make high-level contributions to product 
strategy by identifying new opportunities, 
generating innovative solutions, and 
improving existing features
I experience of leading market projects, 
large and small, from start up to live. 
Among them are 
Foody.vn, 123Phim.vn, 123Go.vn
CONTACT
Phone
077 996 3399
Email khangtruong84@gmail.com
Portfolio http://www.behance.net/truonghuykhang https://dribbble.com/Kantan
SKILLS & EXPERTISE
• 
User Interviews, research
•
Design Thinking
• 
User flows, user journey
•
UI design
•  Sitemap
•
Web design
• 
Wireframe sketching
•
Sketch App
• 
Rapid Prototype, Interaction Prototype
•
Adobe Xd, Photoshop
• 
Usability testing
• 
High-fidelity visual design
• 
Branding design
EDUCATION
HCMC University of Natural Sciences
Graphic Design, Intermedia/Multimedia 
2002 - 2004
w3schools
HTML5 and CSS3
2014

Mobile app (iOs, Android, tablet): Anomo, iCook Book, OCA, Hahn

Responsible retouch, quality control banner, landing pages, email
